CustomField.description: Provide a value for 'N day' rollups, where 'N' is the number of days from today into the past. This value defaults to rollup over the past 365 days.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Provide a value for 'N day' rollups, where 'N' is the number of days from today into the past. This value defaults to rollup over the past 365 days.
CustomField.label: Rollup N Day Value
